text: Mezzettia is a genus of plant in family Annonaceae. It contains the following species, according to The Plant List (which list may be incomplete): * Mezzettia havilandii (Boerl.) Ridl. * Mezzettia macrocarpa Heyden & Kessler * Mezzettia parviflora Becc. * Mezzettia umbellata Becc. ==References== Category:Annonaceae Category:Annonaceae genera Category:Taxa named by Odoardo Beccari Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mezzettia
